storyInfo: Shalem keeps dreaming about the past.

attributes.content: The sky is a strange color.
The sun is dark. The clouds are gray. The sky begins to split in the distance, the crack spreading along its center.
But all this is no longer important.
You remember this day.
You can never forget it.
It is like a prophecy destined to come true, one known by everyone.
It is like a nightmare that can never be shaken, always entwining.
You cannot tell if this is just a play.
Perhaps your entire life is just a play, in the eyes of another.
Abyss.
You ask yourself.
The actor on the stage must follow his script. But what about you?
What choice will you make?
I can't do it.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Don't show mercy, Abyss.
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: The others would still be alive if I hadn't screwed up.
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: You have a chance to make things right. Bring back my head andâ€”
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: Shut up! Don't make me regret this!
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Don't show mercy?
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Then what am I supposed to do?
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: I'm supposed to kill you, take your head and bring it back.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Bide my time, wait for the chance to take revenge...
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: No, that's not right.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: ...Take this.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Your dagger...
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: Take it. Go.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Abyss!
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: What are you going to do, then, if you let me go?
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: You made your choice, once again.
You know what you have to do, don't you?
Thanks for taking care of the kids for the past few days, young man.
attributes.name: Kind Villager

attributes.content: They say you're a great storyteller!
attributes.name: Kind Villager

attributes.content: You're welcome, sir.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: They're all good kids. We should be the ones thanking you for giving us a place to stay.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Oh, no, no, it was no trouble at all.
attributes.name: Kind Villager

attributes.content: I'll leave you to your work, then.
attributes.name: Kind Villager

attributes.content: Telling stories to children?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Looks like you're getting along well with the villagers.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Doesn't take much effort to move your mouth and tongue.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Well, it takes patience I don't have.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Things have been calm here, too calm. The mission's going too smoothly. I'm not used to this.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Calm isn't bad.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Certainly better than running into unexpected trouble...
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: I know, I know, your dream is to retire quietly.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Oh yeah.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I have a gift for you.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Oh? What is it?
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: A round object falls on the ground before you.
It is slightly rotten, and makes a dull thud as it lands.
Your 'gift' rolls along on the ground, stopping at your feet.
The gaze of its lifeless eyes meets yours.
I brought his weapon back, too.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: This is yours, isn't it?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: But... why...
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: The one you let get away.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Suddenly, the past catches up to you, just when you thought you'd finally escaped it.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: It was the right decision to not kill him, Abyss.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: The right decision?
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: It makes the script even better.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: What's the matter, Abyss? Isn't this the script you wrote for the troupe?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Script...?
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: No, no!
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: I have nothing to do with the troupe! I ran away from it a long time ago!
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: This isn't a script! It can't be!
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: It was my own choice...
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: What choice?
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: What are you talking about, Abyss?
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: It was... my own...
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: It was right that I didn't kill you?
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: No, no.
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: I don't know what's vexing you, but the best way is to kill me.
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: No need to take risks. Just carry out the planâ€”
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: There is no plan! It's not time for you to die yet!
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Go! I'll come with you!
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: We can all get out. We just need to be careful this time... don't get caught...
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Calm down, Abyss.
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: I can't escape. It was enough that I got to see you in the end.
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: What are you doing?
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Stop! Stop!
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: I can't let get you into trouble.
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: ...Tell me you're joking.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Get up! Stop acting!
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Get up! We need to go, or it'll be too late!
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Say something!
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: There's no other way, Abyss.
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: Kill me and take my head back.
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: Do you hear me?
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: Kill me! We don't have time!
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: Kill you?
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Put my dagger in your heart like this, and watch you die?
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Yes, that's right.
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: You made the right choice, Abyss...
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: Did I?
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Was it really my choice?
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.text: Everything about 'Abyss' was created by the troupe. The 'self' that you had sought...

attributes.content: Ha... haha...
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: You'll die. I know you'll die.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Your head will inevitably be separated from your neck. I just hope it won't have to fall into the dust and dirt.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: That's why this time, I'll cut your head off myself.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Is that your prophecy, Abyss?
attributes.name: Head

attributes.content: I'm not a prophet. I just saw it.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: I saw you die. You'll die, even if I let you go.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: I ran, but I could never get away.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Of course you can't.
attributes.name: Head

attributes.content: You'll never escape their eyes, no matter how well you hide.
attributes.name: Head

attributes.content: ...Who's watching me?
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: The audience, of course.
attributes.name: Head

attributes.content: Audience... audience?
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Why are they watching me? If I screw up, all they'll do is get rid of me.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Certainly, there are those who are angry at your docile performance on stage. But that's to be expected.
attributes.name: Head

attributes.content: We all know this is where the allure of art truly lies.
attributes.name: Head

attributes.content: A good play with good actors should be able to move people's emotions, don't you think?
attributes.name: Head

attributes.content: No... that's not what it is! It can't be!
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: It was my choice to let you go! It's not their will!
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: If you're really sure about that...
attributes.name: Head

attributes.content: Then why are you still trapped in this nightmare?
attributes.name: Head

attributes.content: Why does that day keep repeating itself, even though you've already escaped?
attributes.name: Head

attributes.content: Why do you keep trying anything you can to detach me from that body and bring me back with you?
attributes.name: Head

attributes.content: You're afraid, Abyss.
attributes.name: Head

attributes.content: Letting me go was your first and only act of defiance.
attributes.name: Head

attributes.content: Running away from the troupe took all the courage you had.
attributes.name: Head

attributes.content: The Blood Diamond had come for you, but all you could do was hide.
attributes.name: Head

attributes.content: You were always more afraid of this all being part of some plan than of actually getting caught.
attributes.name: Head

attributes.content: You don't like being seen, because you're afraid that your 'true self' doesn't actually exist here.
attributes.name: Head

attributes.content: Am I wrong?
attributes.name: Head

attributes.content: Shut your trap.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: You're just a phantom in my dreams. You don't exist!
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: And don't call me Abyss.
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Don't call me by that name!
Poor thing. You couldn't kill your fear. You couldn't silence your doubts.
attributes.name: Broken Skull

attributes.content: You know it's anathema to seek the self.
attributes.name: Broken Skull

attributes.content: But it can achieve great art!
attributes.name: Broken Skull

attributes.content: Even now, you continue to contribute to the stage! They were wrong about you. You're a great actor!
attributes.name: Broken Skull

attributes.content: Shut up! I'm not acting!
I'll free myself from you. I'll kill you!
I won't go back on stage. I'm not Abyss. My life is not a play!
You and your tiny, tiny resolve.
attributes.name: Broken Skull

attributes.content: Then let me ask you.
attributes.name: Broken Skull

attributes.content: Who are you, if not Abyss?
attributes.name: Broken Skull

attributes.content: I amâ€”
...lem?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Shalem?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I... I'm here.
attributes.name: Shalem

attributes.content: Sorry, I was distracted... did something happen?
attributes.name: Shalem

attributes.content: What were you daydreaming about?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Not that it matters. It just sounded like you were talking to someone, so I came over and saw you staring into space.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: ...You were hearing things. I'm the only one here.
attributes.name: Shalem

attributes.content: There's no one else.
attributes.name: Shalem

attributes.content: Really? Guess I should get my hearing checked.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Oh yeah, â– â– .
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: What did you just call me?
attributes.name: â– â–

attributes.content: Huh? â– â– .
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: What's the matter? Isn't that your callsign?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Never mind that. Lookâ€”
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I have a gift for you.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: A gift?
attributes.name: â– â–
